com.justai.zenbox.sdk

Class ResponseData.SuccessResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justai.zenbox.sdk.ResponseData
      • com.justai.zenbox.sdk.ResponseData.SuccessResponse
  • Enclosing class:
    ResponseData

    public static final class ResponseData.SuccessResponse
extends ResponseData
    The SuccessResponse class contains the response data of successfully processed request.

    • Method Detail

      • getQuery

        public java.lang.String getQuery()
        The user's query.
        Returns:
        user's query

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        The text of the Zenbox's answer. This text is going to be synthesised by ZenboxService automatically.
        Returns:
        text of the answer

      • isQuestion

        public boolean isQuestion()
        Indicates that this user's intent leads with upcoming question from the the corresponding skill. ZenboxService will automatically enable speech recognition process if this method returns true.
        Returns:
        true if the corresponding skill requests the interaction with user

      • getAction

        public java.lang.String getAction()
        The action of the response (optional). Please refer to the list of possible actions from every skill in the documentation of Zenbox.
        Returns:
        action or null

      • getIntent

        public java.lang.String getIntent()
        The recognised user's intent. The value contains the URI-like formatted string starting from / .
        Returns:
        user's intent

      • getData

        public org.json.JSONObject getData()
        An additional data of response. The format and content of this filed depends on the corresponding skill. Please refer to the skills documentation to learn about data format for each skill.
        Returns:
        additional response data
